name: studded leather belt.Black leather belt,pyramid studded belt
description:
Black leather belt, genuine latigo, tannery dyed. Solid leather no backing or fillers 51 nickel pyramid studs set in diagonal pattern, single row. Machine sewn edge
Belt fits 42" waist 1.50" wide. Nickel buckle secured with patterned Chicago screws. Easy buckle change
These belts are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Other sizes available. Please contact us

name: leather guitar strap, studded guitar strap, checkered pattern guitar strap
description:
Genuine leather guitar strap, Black latigo tannery dyed.
Size 3" wide adjustable from 37" to 52" nine slots for strap adjustment
130 pyramid studs alternating black and white in checkerboard pattern
Back is padded with foam, covered with soft garment hide, edges machine sewn.
Each guitar strap is hand made in our shop from top quality materials. All have our 10% satisfaction guarantee

name: leather guitar strap. studded leather straps,Guitar straps,guitar accessories
description:
Genuine leather guitar strap, vegetable tanned latigo. Tannery dyed black.
Sixe. 3" wide adjusts from 37" to 52".  nine adjusting slots.
108 hand set nickel pyramid studs. set in a diagonal pattern. Back is padded with foam, covered with a soft black garment hide, Edges machine sewn.
These straps are completely hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Other style are becoming available

name: Leather belt. Black, Pyramid studs
description:
Black leather belt. Genuine vegetable tanned latigo hide. Tannery dyed. No backing or padding.                                                       Size. Fits 42" waist. 1" wide. 68 Nickel pyramid studs in single  row. Horseshoe Brand stainless steel buckle, Attached with patterned headed nickel Chicago screws for easy buckle change.
Free  leather wrist cuff, similar design Nickel snap fasteners
 Please advise wrist size.
These items are handmade in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100 % satisfactory guarantee applies to all purchases.
All hardware is hand set.
Please contact us with details of your waist size.
sizes from 36" to 42" Please contact us for other information and other sizes.

name: Pot Pourri bowl Pewter lid. Wood turnings
description:
Turned wood bowl, Mahogany. Yellow Cedar and Oak
2.75" high 4.25" diameter. lid opening 2.75" inside bowl depth 2"
The lid is a combination of Pewter and zinc Rose design. Very attractive.
Has many uses but is a good Pot Pourri bowl as the lid has vents

name: Waterfowl cast study bills
description:
Resin cast study bills for waterfowl carvers.
A must for getting bill details, these are full size.
One each of the following.
Loon. Canada Goose, Shoveler Green Wing Teal drake and Mallard drake. Wood duck drake and Red Breasted merganser (Not shown)
These are in excellent condition. We no longer carve water fowl so some other artist may as well have benefit
Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: Studded wrist cuff and choker leather
description:
Wrist cuff and choker set, Genuine vegetable tanned black leather. Tannery dyed. Black and white pyramid studs alternating. Nickel snap fastener.
Size  3/4" wide. Cuffs fits 7.5" wrist. Choker fits  14" neck. These items can be ordered to your specific size combination. Black or dark brown leather.. Please advise, 
These items are hand made in our shop from top quality materials, Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: Leather choker and wrist band
description:
Leather choker and cuff set, Hand made from genuine vegetable tanned hide.  Tannery dyed black.
Cuff is 1" wide and fits 7" wrist.
Choker is 1" wide and fits 12" neck.
Cuff has four black grommets with 3/8" center holes 4 synthetic crystals. Nickel snap fastener .
Choker has 6 black grommets 3/8" center holes 7 synthetic crystal studs. Nickel snap fastener.
These items are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Orders accepted. Please contact us with your required size

options.name: orders taken for your size combination

name: Leather Holster
description:
Leather holster for Smith Wesson .38 caliber, 5 shot 2" barrel. Suits J frame handguns.

Genuine English bridle vegetable tanned  leather, tannery dyed dark brown.
Hand sewn with waxed thread, brass Chicago screw for added strength.
Sewn belt loop fits up to 1.5" belt. Worn left side for cross over draw.
Hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Moulded over resin casting of this model handgun
  Please contact us for Custom orders

name: Revolver holster
description:
Genuine leather holster. vegetable tanned English bridle leather, tannery dyed dark brown. Interior lined with dark brown soft garment hide .Hand sewn with waxed thread. Nickel Chicago screw for added strength.
Safety strap attached with nickel snap fasteners, removable.
Made to fit up to 2" belt.
Holster moulded to fit Smith and Wesson  .38 caliber double action hand gun with 4" barrel. Suits K frame models.
Suited for right hand wear straight draw.
These holsters are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies
Not suited for models 65 and 67

name: Hand gun holster,leather
description:
Leather holster, Genuine English bridle vegetable tanned hide. Tannery dyed dark brown. Holster moulded to fit Smith & Wesson .38 caliber, double action hand gun with 4" barrel. Made for the K frame style guns.
Fits up to 1.5" belt. Hand sewn with waxed thread. Nickel Chicago screw for added strength. Has safety strap attached with nickel snap fasteners . Can be pulled back or removed during use, Hammer and trigger guard are covered. Belt loop sewn at approximately 20 degree angle. Left side wear.butt slight angle forward  Right hand slight angle to back.
Holster is lined with soft garment hide, dark brown.
All items are hand made in our shop from top quality materials, Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Not suitable for model 65 and 67

name: Guitar strap, leather, studded.
description:
Guitar strap, Genuine English bridle leather, tannery dyed dark brown.
Size 3" wide, adjusts from 37" to 52"
Front is patterned with brass pyramid studs in diamond pattern 4 studs in each block in a row of 8. Row of brass rivets on each side.
Bottom of strap is fitted with a solid brass buckle, strap ends and keeper. Mainly decorative but can be adjusted. Top of strap has nine adjustment slots.
Back is padded with foam and covered with a soft brown garment hide. Edges are machine sewn
All straps are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applied..(See our policy)
Please contact us for other styles. colours patterns

name: Rocking horse blankets
description:
Blanket for the family rocking horse,
This blanket is made from  genuine red Melton cloth. edged with white tape and secured with nylon fasteners ate the chest.
This blanket is made to fit either the large or small carved rocking horse
Melton is heavy quality.
Size. neck tail 17"  width around he horse body 29" overall length chest to tail 29"
During our30 years as rocking horse builders we sold quite a number.
These blankets are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: leather sun visors
description:
Leather sun visors, sun shades. Handmade from genuine vegetable tanned black cowhide.
Peak is patterned with nickel pyramid spot, surrounded with nickel rivets. or a 1/2" spot surrounded by nickel rivets. Circular patterns. Back of peak is lined with soft black garment hide, edge machine sewn. The peak is hand sewn to the headband with waxed thread. the corners are riveted for strength.  Adjustable size using nickel buckle.
These items are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Two only in stock reduced to clear

name: studded leather guitar strap
description:
Genuine leather guitar strap. Vegetable tanned latigo, tannery dyed black.
108 hand set nickel pyramid studs diagonal pattern. Back is padded with foam and covered with a soft black garment hide, machine sewn around edges.
Size 3" wide adjusts from 37" to 52"
These straps are completely had made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies
Many other colours and styles are and will be available

name: hand gun holster
description:
Leather holster for Smith and Wesson .38 caliber, 5 shot. 2" barrel. Model J frame
Hand made from genuine English bridle leather, vegetable tanned, tannery dyed dark brown
Moulded to fit the J frame model.
This is a clip on holster with nickel locking fitting. fits 1.5" belt angled at about 20 degrees.
Two available one for left hand wear one for right hand. Crossover draw. Please advise which model.
These holsters are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100%satisfaction guarantee applies

name: Hand gun holster
description:
Leather hand gun holster, Hand made from genuine vegetable tanned leather, natural colour finish, waxed and polished. Lined with dark brown soft garment hide.
This holster moulded around a casting for the Smith and Wesson .38 caliber. 5 shot 2" barrel. J frame.
Made for left side wear, crossover draw. Belt loop angled at 20 degrees, fits 1.5" belt. Chicago screw added for strength, Belt loop sewn and riveted
All holsters are hand made in our shop. hand sewn with waxed thread. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: Leather belt, stamped and grommeted
description:
Genuine solid leather belt, vegetable tanned English bridle leather, tannery dyed  black. No fillers or padding.
Sized to fit 38" waist. 1.5" wide. Nickel buckle secured with patterned nickel Chicago screws, easy buckle change.
Pattern comprises of a stamped edge design, Centre is a row of black grommets 3/4" wide with 3/8" centre hole.
These belts are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies
Other sizes are available. Please contact us .

name: Guitar strap  genuine leather
description:
Hand made guitar strap, Genuine latigo  leather, vegetable tanned, tannery dyed black,
Backing red lather exposed through varying size hole, centered with nickel rivets, Pattern surrounded with row on nickel rivets. Back is padded with foam, covered with a soft black garment hide, edges machine sewn.
Size. 3" wide extends from 37" to 52"
All straps are hand made in our shop from top quality material. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: leather guitar strap
description:
Guitar strap, genuine latigo leather , vegetable tanned, tannery dyed black.
Size 3" wide adjustable from 37" to 52"
Back is padded with foam and soft black garment hide. Machine sewn
Pattern part is red suede with nickel rivets
Each strap is hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: leather hand gun holster
description:
Genuine leather holster. Hand made from English bridle leather, vegetable tanned. Tannery dyed dark brown.
Lined interior with dark brown soft garment hide. Hand sewn with waxes thread. Nickel Chicago screw for added strength. Safety strap attached with Nickel snap fasteners for easy removal.  Fits up to 2" belt.
Suited for right hand wear, straight draw.
This holster was moulded to fit Smith Wesson magnum with 4" barrel. Model 67. Will suit similar frame.
These holsters are hand made in  our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies. Holsters are moulded to fit actual casting of the hand gun.

name: Art print. Windsor Casle
description:
London art print depicting Windsor Castle. Colour print by French artist dated 1976.
Size 18.25" long x 15.0" high. I have mounted the print on 3/8" fomecore board and matted it ready for framing. Double mat, Inside colour white/cream outside mat French Blue. 
We have had this print in our possession since 1976 when it was purchased new in London. Prints have been in storage since then.
All prints were mounted by us in our shop. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies

name: Wood Platter with Pewter handles
description:
Hand made wood serving platter, variety of hardwoods ,oak, yellow cedar, mahogany. Pewter handles in shape of rooster.
Size 9.25" wide x 14.25" long.
Wood is finished in food safe materials.
This is a useful item either as a serving platter or wall decoration or plain table decoration. 
The handles are imported from France where this is a popular item.
The platter was made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.

name: Studded leather belt. Black
description:
Black leather belt. Genuine vegetable tanned latigo. Tannery dyed. No backings or paddings. Size. Fits 32" waist 1.00" wide.
Single row of 1/2" nickel pyramid studs  Nickel buckle, nickel snap fasteners for easy buckle change.
These belts are hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
Other sizes are available. Please contact us

name: Art print. Buckingham Palace.
description:
London art print of Buckingham Palace. mounted on 3/8" fomecore board. Matted  with single mat in French Blue. Ready for you to frame.
Matted size 15" high x 18.25" wide.
We have had this in our possession since 1976. It has been stored since then  and was purchased new in London. I have recentl matted and mounted this picture in our shop.
It is a signed print.
Other scenes available. Houses of Parliament,  Windsor Castle, Trafalgar Square

name: Bicycle saddle bag, Black leather. Cycle tote bag
description:
Bicycle saddle bag. Genuine English bridle leather, tannery dyed Black.
Size, 11.0" long, 3.25" wide,5.75" high. Brass buckles and rivets.
Hand laced with calf lacing in a double loop stitch,
Extra long gussets for weather protection,
Fits standard saddle loops
Leather has a waxed finish and is ideal for all weather conditions,
This saddle bag is completely hand made in our shop from top quality materials. Our 100% satisfaction guarantee applies.
The laced edges make this a very attractive bike bag. Sturdy in construction. Last one at this price.
